title: Update to SLF4J 1.7.6.
description: We are getting fairly behind, we should update and pick up the latest bug fixes and improvements.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: One of the release note comments for 1.7.5: Given the significance of these performance improvements, users are highly encouraged to migrate to SLF4J version 1.7.5 or later.
